well you can see if your firewall is turned on by doing : sudo ufw status. If its disabled your ports to that computer are open (the ones that are configured anyway)
if you mean to get out from behind your router you will have to consult the router manual for that.

if MPD isn't running then the port won't open. Linux doesn't keep a port open unless it's being used ;)
